All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AemCryptoEncryptHelper
Handlebars helper that encrypts a given string with AEM crypto key.
AemDispatcherFilterHelper
Handlebars helper that generates AEM dispatcher ANY access rules from a given object structure as defined by https://docs.adobe.com/docs/en/dispatcher/disp-config.html#par_134_32_0009
AemHttpdFilterHelper
Handlebars helper that generates HTTPd access rules.
AemPluginConfig
AEM plugin parameters for generic CONGA plugin configuration.
AnyEscapingStrategy
Escapes for ANY files.
AnyFileHeader
Adds file headers to ANY files.
AnyValidator
Validates Day ANY files.
ContentPackageBinaryFile
Binary to be added to content package.
ContentPackageOptions
Option property names for content package post processors ContentPackagePostProcessor and ContentPackageOsgiConfigPostProcessor.
ContentPackageOsgiConfigPostProcessor
Transforms a Sling Provisioning file or Combined JSON file as used by CONGA Sling Plugin into OSGi configurations and then packages them up in an AEM content package to be deployed via CRX package manager.
ContentPackagePostProcessor
Transforms a JSON file describing a JCR content structure to an AEM content package to be deployed via CRX package manager.
ContentPackagePropertiesPostProcessor
Extracts properties from a given AEM content package and stores them as additional model options in the file context.
ContentPackageUtil
Option property names for content package post processors ContentPackagePostProcessor and ContentPackageOsgiConfigPostProcessor.
ContentPackageValidator
Validates AEM content packages with Jackrabbit FileVault validator.
CryptoKeySupport
Supports generating and reading crypto keys.
CryptoString
Converts byte array to crypto string and back in the same fashion as it is done by the Adobe Granite Crypto implementation.
CryptoSupport
Support for symmetric encryption and decryption of data.
HttpdCloudManagerConditionalHelper
Checks if there is a conditional statement 'httpd.cloudManagerConditional' in the current context.
HttpHostHelper
Handlebars helper that adds a port to the host when it is not the default one
HttpHostSslHelper
Handlebars helper that adds a port to the host when it is not the default one
JsonContentLoader
Imports JSON data and binary data into Sling resource hierarchy.
OakAuthorizableUuidHelper
Handlebars helper that builds a password hash for a given password string of an Oak JCR user.
OakPasswordHashHelper
Handlebars helper that builds a password hash for a given password string of an Oak JCR user.
WebConsolePasswordHashHelper
Handlebars helper that builds a password hash for a given password string for the Apache Felix Webconsole (felix.webconsole.password).
WithAllCloudManagerConditionalHelper
Checks if there is a conditional statement 'httpd.cloudManagerConditional' in the current context.
